cells.data:
#查看openssl版本
openssl version

#安装EPEL源
rpm -ivh http://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/6/x86_64/epel-release-6-8.noarch.rpm

#安装gcc
yum install gcc gcc-c++ glibc-static -y  

#安装wget
yum install -y wget

#安装curl
yum install -y curl

#安装openssl
yum install openssl

##或者简单使用下面命令安装开发工具
yum -y groupinstall 'Development Tools'
